00041 #ifndef _Camera_cpp
00042 #define _Camera_cpp

00044 #include "camera.h"

00047 #include <Ogre.h>

00049 namespace phys
00050 {
00051     Camera::Camera(const String& Name, CameraManager* Manager)
00052     {
00053         Ogre::Camera* OgreCam = Manager->SManager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createCamera(Name);
00054         this->Construct(OgreCam, Manager);
00055     }
00056 
00057     Camera::Camera(Ogre::Camera* Camera, CameraManager* Manager)
00058     {
00059         this->Construct(Camera, Manager);
00060     }
00061 
00062     void Camera::Construct(Ogre::Camera* Camera, CameraManager* Manager)
00063     {
00064         this->Cam = Camera;
00065         this->CamManager = Manager;
00066         this->SetNearClipDistance(5.0f);
00067         this->SetFarClipDistance(5000.0f);
00068         SetElementType(Attachable::Camera);
00069     }
00070 
00071     Camera::~Camera()
00072     {
00073         CamManager->SManager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroyCamera(Cam);
00074     }
00075 
00076     String& Camera::GetName()
00077     {
00078         return this->Cam->getName();
00079     }
00080 
00081     void Camera::SetCameraType(ProjectionType Type)
00082     {
00083         if( Camera::Orthographic == Type )
00084         {
00085             this->Cam->setProjectionType(Ogre::PT_ORTHOGRAPHIC);
00086         }
00087         else if( Camera::Perspective == Type )
00088         {
00089             this->Cam->setProjectionType(Ogre::PT_PERSPECTIVE);
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093     void Camera::SetOrthoWindow(Real Width, Real Height)
00094     {
00095         this->Cam->setOrthoWindow(Width, Height);
00096     }

00099     {
00100         this->Cam->setOrthoWindowHeight(Height);
00101     }

00106     }

00109     {
00110         this->Cam->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());

00165     Ray Camera::GetCameraToViewportRay(Real Screenx, Real Screeny)
00166     {
00167         Ray R(this->Cam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00168         return R;
00169     }
00170 
00171     String Camera::GetNodeAttachedToCamera()
00172     {
00173         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->Cam->getParentSceneNode();
00174         return tempnode->getName();
00175     }
00176 
00177     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraRelativeLocation()
00178     {
00179         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getPosition());
00180         return camloc;
00181     }
00182 
00183     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraGlobalLocation()
00184     {
00185         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getRealPosition());
00186         return camloc;
00187     }

00189     void Camera::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom)
00190     {
00191         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00192         this->Cam->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00193     }
00194 
00195     void Camera::ResetZoom()
00196     {
00197         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00198         loc = this->Cam->getPosition();
00199         Real zoom=loc.z;
00200         zoom=0-zoom;
00201         this->Cam->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00202     }
